div.p:
Implemented features fall into these categories :
Maven Project recognition
Maven Launcher
POM Visual Customizer
Maven projects are recognized in the IDE by the Mevenide module. No synchronization is needed since the module retrieves and stores data directly to/from Maven project files.

ul.li: All kind of sources and resources easily accessible
Dependencies recognized and code completion database clreated on the fly.
Updates dynamically once project files are edited.
Changes in library sources not reflected in dependent project's completion.
Direct integration with menu action and keyboard shotcuts for Build/Rebuild/Clean etc.
List of all available goals - plugin-defined ones as well as custom ones for project.
Possibility to define your own goal-launching popup menu.
Executes maven as external process. Thus cannot set JVM options etc.
No hyperlinking in output window to errors when compiling.
In this version just no editing.
Currently only basic dependencies page is listed.
